item.title: Problem with my ::item command [PI]

I’ll try that.

EDIT: Nothing happened, huh, theres no place it says only playerRights over 3 can do ::item, but i still can only do it on super admin+.

I completely removed the second ::item command in the end of commands.java which was clearly in the super admin section (ipban etc was there), and modified the first one so you dont need any specific rights to do the command.

Maybe i misunderstood what you were trying to say.

item.title: Problem with my ::item command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

Maybe try taking out the rights requirement. This is my server’s command and it works perfectly.

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with my ::item command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @solarized solarized
item.description:
@solarized wrote:

Hello, i’m currently using a PI source with 317 characters, and i’ve made some nice progress for a spawn server.
I have a big problem though, in commands.java i have two places with the command ‘::item’, and currently it can only be done by super admins+ (playerright = 3). What i want to do is make everyone able to spawn items.
I have no permission problems with any other commands, just this one.
I have tried removing other ::item command, replacing them with eachother etc, but i cant get it to work.

The first code looks like this: (it’s in the beginning next to other commands that everyone should be able to use)

		[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights >= 0) {

			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}
		}

		}[/code]

The second ‘::item’ command looks like this (This one is in the bottom with most of the admin+ commands)

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 0) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

Any help would be appreciated, this is a really big problem for me, been trying to google fixes etc for 3 days now.

Read full topic
